statement.tex: \text{Solve the following matrix equation for x,} \\ \left[\begin{array}{cc} x & 1 \end{array}\right]\times \left[\begin{array}{cc} 1 & 0 \\ -2 & 0 \end{array}\right]=0.

step.context: \text{What would the be the rows and columns} \\ \text{of a matrix which is the product of a $1\times 2$}\\ \text{and a $2\times 2$ matrix?} \\ (a \times b = \text{rows }\times \text{columns})
step.reason: \text{The product of an $(a\times b)$ matrix and a $(b\times c)$} \\ \text{matrix is an $(a\times c)$ matrix.}
